title: Acting President condoles death of renowned artist Talat Hussain
content:
ISLAMABAD, May 26 (APP): Acting President Syed Yusuf Raza Gilani on Sunday expressed deep sorrow and grief over demise of renowned artist Talat Hussain.
Late Talat Hussainâ€™s invaluable contributions to the arts will always be remembered, the acting president said in a message.
He prayed to Allah Almighty to grant the departed soul a high rank in paradise and courage to the bereaved family members to bear this loss with patience.
